verses.text: Bel boweth down, Nebo stoopeth, Their idols were upon the beasts, and upon the cattle: Your carriages \add were\add* heavy loaden; \add They are\add* a burden to the weary \add beast\add*.
They stoop, they bow down together; They could not deliver the burden, But themselves are gone into captivity.
Hearken unto me, O house of Jacob, And all the remnant of the house of Israel, Which are borne \add by me\add* from the belly, Which are carried from the womb:

And \add even\add* to \add your\add* old age I \add am\add* he; And \add even\add* to hoar hairs will I carry \add you:\add* I have made, and I will bear; Even I will carry, and will deliver \add you\add*.
To whom will ye liken me, and make \add me\add* equal, And compare me, that we may be like?
They lavish gold out of the bag, And weigh silver in the balance, \add And\add* hire a goldsmith; and he maketh it a god: They fall down, yea, they worship.

They bear him upon the shoulder, they carry him, And set him in his place, and he standeth; From his place shall he not remove: Yea, \add one\add* shall cry unto him, yet can he not answer, Nor save him out of his trouble.
Remember this, and shew yourselves men: Bring \add it\add* again to mind, O ye transgressors.
Remember the former \add things\add* of old: For I \add am\add* God, and \add there is\add* none else; \add I am\add* God, and \add there is\add* none like me,
Declaring the end from the beginning, And from ancient times \add the things\add* that are not \add yet\add* done, Saying, My counsel shall stand, And I will do all my pleasure:

Calling a ravenous bird from the east, The man that executeth my counsel from a far country: Yea, I have spoken \add it\add*, I will also bring it to pass; I have purposed \add it\add*, I will also do it.
Hearken unto me, ye stouthearted, That \add are\add* far from righteousness:
I bring near my righteousness; it shall not be far off, And my salvation shall not tarry: And I will place salvation in Zion for Israel my glory.
